*div1 type="summary"* *p*Dr. John Sibley to Austin, March 12, 1827. Report that United States has acquired part of Texas. British designs on Cuba.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Natchitoches */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="03-12-1827">March 12. 1827*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr. Sir.*/p*
*p*I had the pleasure to Receive your letter by *person_mentioned*Col Milam*/person_mentioned* dated *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="03-04-1827">March 4th*/date_mentioned*—for which I thank you. You say you had not Recd a packet I sent you by *person_mentioned*Mr. Dubois*/person_mentioned* when I mentioned that to *person_mentioned*Col. Milam*/person_mentioned* he informed me that *person_mentioned*Dubois */person_mentioned*had not arrived when he left you—I Embrace the Opportunity by *person_mentioned*Col Thorn*/person_mentioned* of sending you a few *location_mentioned*papers */location_mentioned*to which Refer you for the news as we have it. several circumstances have Occurred corroborative of the Report of *location_mentioned*Taxas */location_mentioned*or some part of it being ceded to the *location_mentioned*United States*/location_mentioned* it will in a short time be officially communicated*person_mentioned* Genl Gains*/person_mentioned* left here *date_mentioned n="03-12-1827">this Morning*/date_mentioned* we shall heare from him from *location_mentioned*Baton Rouge*/location_mentioned* some new disposition of the *person_mentioned*U. S. Troops*/person_mentioned* in this *location_mentioned*quarter */location_mentioned*will soon be made a *person_mentioned*Regiment */person_mentioned*probably will soon be Rendezvoued at *location_mentioned*Cantonment Jessup*/location_mentioned*— If it was possible for you to Remain in the *location_mentioned*district of Nacogdoches*/location_mentioned* for a short time I have no doubt but you may be farther informed on that subject, it may be of great Interest. Our *person_mentioned*Congress */person_mentioned*Rose the *date_mentioned n="03-04-1827">4th of March*/date_mentioned* without finishing one half of the Business before them it may be necessary for the *person_mentioned*President */person_mentioned*to call the *person_mentioned*members */person_mentioned*together again before the Meeting Ordinary. Our Relations with *location_mentioned*England */location_mentioned*may Require it. There is some Reason to believe *location_mentioned*England */location_mentioned*may attempt to occupy *location_mentioned*Cuba */location_mentioned*that we cannot agree to, that Govt has already shut their *location_mentioned*West India Ports*/location_mentioned* to our Vessels, they would do the same in *location_mentioned*Cuba */location_mentioned*did they command that *location_mentioned*island*/location_mentioned*—*location_mentioned*England */location_mentioned*is now engaged in defending *location_mentioned*Portugal */location_mentioned*against the agressions of *location_mentioned*Spain*/location_mentioned*, when that affair is finished, which cannot last long they will be Looking Out for new Employment for their immence Land and Naval forse, the Bermes War in *location_mentioned*India */location_mentioned*is settled.—*/p*
*p*I send you some More *location_mentioned*News papers */location_mentioned*There is a man leaving here by the name of *person_mentioned*John Williams*/person_mentioned*, who says he lived some time in the *location_mentioned*Trinity Bay*/location_mentioned*, he says he has a Grant from you of a League Square of Land you will oblige me if you will inform me if his Right is a good one and if he should transfer his Right if it would be good, and what formality would be required in Case of a sale. As I contemplate moving into that *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*in some future time I feel Enclined to secure some Land for the Benefit of my *location_mentioned*children*/location_mentioned*—Some suspension of our correspondence did take place. I am not disposed to discuss the subject relative to who was in fault. I dislike to look backwards, much more than forward.—You will greatly Oblige me by attending to my demand against the State of *person_mentioned*John McFarlane*/person_mentioned* I am told his place is valuable. I will take that in full discharge of my judgement provided by your Permission I can obtain a Right.—you will Add to my present Obligations to you If you will give me such information about it as the case will suggest to you I might wish to know. Our *person_mentioned*Legislature */person_mentioned*will rise this week, the *location_mentioned*River */location_mentioned*is in fine Steam Boating Order. I know of nothing important the *person_mentioned*Legislature */person_mentioned*has done It has been occupied much in private matters, giving the Right of granting divorces to the *location_mentioned*District Courts*/location_mentioned*, and seperating the corporation of *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned* are the principal things.*/p*
*p*If I could have known at what time you would have been at *location_mentioned*Sabine */location_mentioned*I certainly would have met you there, we wish much to have some arangement about our Exchange of Mails from *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*When you see your *person_mentioned*Brother */person_mentioned*please to present to him my compliments and Best wishes. I wish he would write to me occasionally a correspondence with him would give me pleasure. I shall be glad to serve him and you in any way in my Power. I Expect *person_mentioned*Judge Johnston*/person_mentioned* in three or four Weeks, his family will remain at *location_mentioned*Washington */location_mentioned*of course his visit to *location_mentioned*Louisiana */location_mentioned*will be short. */p* *p*John Sibley*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Hon S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Honble. Stephen F. Austin */person_mentioned**location_mentioned*Nacogdochis*/location_mentioned*-by *person_mentioned*Col Thorn*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
